9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Amr narrated that :He heard the Messenger of Allah saying: "Indeed the Corner and the Maqam are two corundums from the corundum of Paradise. Allah removed their lights, and if their lights had not been removed then they would illuminate what is between east and the west

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الْحَجَرِ الأَسْوَدِ وَالرُّكْنِ وَالْمَقَامِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtues Of The Black Stone, Its Corner, And The Maqam
